acf.title: Head of Investor Relations, EMEA
acf.bio_copy:
Jean-Luc Roghe is Head of Investor Relations, EMEA and responsible for developing new and existing investor relationships in the region.

Prior to joining Millennium in 2010, Jean-Luc was at HSBC Global Asset Management for almost seven years, most recently as a Hedge Fund Product Specialist in London, where he was in charge of raising the profile of HSBC's single strategy hedge funds globally. He began his career at BNP Paribas in Monaco working with private banking investors.

Jean-Luc received a double BA degree with Honors in Business and Management from Napier University, Edinburgh. He received his Master’s degree in Finance & Marketing at IPAG Nice.
